_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Pumpkin | Optimized
author: andreas@damon.sh
description: This is the Pumpkin variant of Minecraft Servers made from scratch in Rust.

installation.script:
RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=-crt-static -C target-cpu=native"

echo "Installing dependencies"
apk add --no-cache git musl-dev

echo "Cloning latest pumpkin"
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
git clone https://github.com/Snowiiii/Pumpkin.git

echo "Compiling pumpkin binary!"
cd Pumpkin/
cargo build --release --jobs 4 # do not increase this job count, counterintuitively this increase compile times (and possibly deadlocks!!!)
cp target/release/pumpkin ./pumpkin.release
strip ./pumpkin.release

echo "Copying executable to server directory."
cp ./pumpkin.release /mnt/server/pumpkin

echo "Cleaning up build directory."
rm -rf /mnt/server/Pumpkin

echo "Ensuring execute permissions on executable."
chmod +x /mnt/server/pumpkin

echo "Installation complete!"
